title.rendered: Bruce Springsteen and Patti Scialfa’s ‘Addicted To Romance’

content.rendered:
Bruce Springsteen and Patti Scialfa’s original collaboration “Addicted To Romance” is out today, included on the soundtrack for the upcoming motion picture “She Came To Me.” With lyrics inspired by the film itself — which stars Anne Hathaway, Peter Dinklage and Marisa Tomei — “Addicted To Romance” includes production by longtime Springsteen collaborator Ron Aniello and GRAMMY Award winner Bryce Dessner. “She Came To Me” is directed by Rebecca Miller, and will officially release in the U.S. next Friday, Oct. 6.

Listen to Bruce Springsteen and Patti Scialfa’s “Addicted To Romance.”
